BR_text.BRdescription:
Dependabot encountered the following error when parsing your .dependabot/config.yml:
 <denchmark-code>The property '#/update_configs/0/ignored_updates/0/match' of type string did not match the following type: object
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Please update the config file to conform with Dependabot's specification using our <denchmark-link:https://dependabot.com/docs/config-file/>docs</denchmark-link>
  and <denchmark-link:https://dependabot.com/docs/config-file/validator/>online validator</denchmark-link>
 .

comments_0.comment_text: Hi! Thank you for your contribution! Great first issue!
